Title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
Overview: To prevent a world war from breaking out, famous characters from Victorian literature band together to do battle against a cunning villain.
Tagline: The power of seven become a league of one.
Keywords: saving the world, vampire, bite, men, invisible man, captain nemo, allan quatermain, venezia, immortal
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, JD Productions, International Production Company, Angry Films, Mediastream Dritte Film GmbH & Co. Beteiligungs KG
Cast: Sean Connery, Peta Wilson, Shane West
